name: Sylvan Horned Beast King, Magnolia
effect: [AUTO](VC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your rear-guards, and until end of turn, that unit can attack from the back row, and gets [Power] +5000. If you persona rode this turn, choose three rear-guards instead of one.
flavor: Surpassing admiration. In order to protect the place of importance.

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Lattice
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Sylvan Horned Beast King, Magnolia", [COST][Soul-Blast 1], reveal the top card of your deck, if it is a unit card, call it to (RC), and if it isn't, put it into your hand. [AUTO]Back Row (RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: Do not fear change. Your thoughts will always remain the same.

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Charis
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Sylvan Horned Beast, Lattice", you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a grade 2 or less unit card, call it to (RC), and if it isn't, put it into your soul.[CONT]Back Row (RC):During the battle this unit attacked, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: Step by step, getting closer to that which you admire.

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Lotte
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.

name: Seizing Slash Mutant, Bruslash
flavor: Pince and slice! I'll split you into two with this!

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Dooger
effect: [CONT](RC):If you have four or more other rear-guards, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: The wise beasts understood the significance of sacrifice.

name: Looting Petal Stomalia
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 &[Soul-Blast 1], and until end of turn, this unit gets "Boost", and [Power] +5000.
flavor: The great sage brought forth the Wise Cubes upon their death.

name: Knight of Friendship, Cyrus
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 2], reveal the top card of your deck, if it is a unit card, call it to (RC), and if it isn't, put it into your hand.
flavor: It'll be fine. We have reliable comrades with us.

name: Hopeful Maiden, Alejandra
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck.)[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), [COST][discard a card from your hand], choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle.
flavor: To survive tomorrow, we must prepare now.

name: Spiritual King of Determination, Olbaria
effect: (You may only have one [Over] trigger in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, remove that card, draw a card, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] Trigger +100 Million until end of turn! If revealed during drive check, activate its additional effect!)Additional Effect - Choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] Trigger +100 Million until end of turn!
flavor: When life and dreams overlap, limitless power blooms.

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Jackalope
effect: (When revealed as a trigger, choose one of your units, and it gets [Critical] Trigger +1 until end of turn! Then, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] Trigger +10000 until end of turn!)
flavor: Borrowing power from the land and seas, Sylvan Horned Beasts bend nature to their will.

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Polatter
effect: (When revealed as a trigger, draw a card! Then, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] Trigger +10000 until end of turn!)
flavor: I have confidence in my ability to identify delicious fruits.

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Valin
effect: (When revealed as a trigger, all of your front row units get [Power] Trigger +10000 until end of turn!)
flavor: Dialogue through horns. The initiative remains firmly in their hands.

name: Sylvan Horned Beast, Zlatorog
effect: (You may only have up to four [Heal] triggers in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] Trigger +10000 until end of turn! Then, if the number of cards in your damage zone is equal to or more than your opponent's, choose a card from your damage zone, and heal it!)
flavor: Please, go ahead. There's no need to stand on ceremony.

name: Call to the Beasts
effect: (Blitz order can only be played when you would call a guardian)Choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle. If you have three or more back row rear-guards, it gets [Power] +15000 instead of +5000.
flavor: The Lettia Great Canyon is understood to be the territory of the Sylvan Beasts.
